title: CMMC Self-Assessment Guide Level 1
source_organization: Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Acquisition and Sustainment (OUSD(A&S))
purpose: This document provides self-assessment guidance for Level 1 of the Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC).
focus: Level 1 addresses the protection of Federal Contract Information (FCI).
applicability: This guide is intended for organizations seeking self-assessment for Level 1 compliance under the CMMC framework.
basis: Federal Acquisition Regulation (FAR) Clause 52.204-21 basic safeguarding requirements.
